rukus.text: 45|2|E kitaba mahaparakramasali, prajnamaya allahara kacha theke nayilakrta.
45|3|Niscaya asamanasamuha o yamine muminadera jan'ya rayeche bahu nidarsana.
45|4|Ara tomadera srsti ebam jiba-jantura bistare bahu nidarsana rayeche emana sampradayera jan'ya, yara niscita bisbasa sthapana kare

45|5|ara rata o dinera paribartane ebam allaha akasa hate ye riyaka (pani) barsana karena, atahpara tini ta dbara yaminake tara mrtyura para punarjibita karena tate ebam bayura paribartane aneka nidarsana rayeche, emana sampradayera jan'ya yara bojhe.
45|6|Egulo allahara ayata, ya amara apanara kache tila'oyata karachi yathayathabhabe. Kaje'i allaha ebam tamra ayatera pare tara ara kon banite imana anabe [1]
45|8|se allahara ayatasamuha sone ya tara kache tila'oyata kara haya, tarapara se aud'dhatyera sathe atala thake yena se ta soneni. Ata'eba, apani take susambada dina yantranadayaka sastira
45|9|ara yakhana se amadera kono ayata abagata haya, takhana se setake parihasera patra rupe grahana kare. Tadera'i jan'ya rayeche lanchanadayaka sasti.
45|10|Tadera samane rayeche jahannama; tadera krtakarma tadera kono kaje asabe na, tara allahâ€Œra paribarte yaderake abhibhabaka sthira kareche ora'o naya. Ara tadera jan'ya rayeche mahasasti.
45|11|E kura'ana satpathera disari; ara yara tadera rabera ayatasamuhera sathe kuphari kare, tadera jan'ya rayeche khuba'i yantranadayaka sasti.
